health-bar: This is your health bar. It can be accessed by entering 'h'. If it goes to 0, something bad might happen.
golden-egg: You acquired this at the beginning of your journey after an act of kindness. Who knows when it will come in handy?
dead-chicken: You acquired this at the beginning of your journey after killing an innocent livestock. Consumable for random amount of health.
key: You don't remember where or how you got this key. I guess you just spawned with it on you. Maybe it will be useful later?
